modShortDescription: Adds a buildable / buyable sniper turret that uses 7.62 AP ammo.
modDescription:
Adds a buildable / buyable [sniper turret](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-traps/) that uses 7.62 AP ammo.

It has long range and game standard 7.72 AP ammo damage, with a high headshot chance and damage. Also shocks the target upon impact.

Should be compatible with any other mods.

## Installation

Simply unzip into main … 7daystodie / Mods … folder as any other simple mod. If u have no Mods folder under main game directory, simply create one and unzip it there so it ends up like … <game folder> / Mods / <MyMod>

Enjoy!

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/11BfREA0RgxGwhknXuX3EGU41T50bWW9j/view?usp=sharing)**

**Credits:** [Furious Angel](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/furious-angel/)
